name: Medals and Military Honors
description: Military decorations awarded for valor, service, and exceptional achievement.

medals.name: Medal of Valor
medals.description: Awarded for conspicuous bravery in combat, particularly when the recipient's actions saved comrades or turned the tide of battle.
mechanicalEffects: Military personnel start with a Friendly attitude toward you.
Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks when rallying troops or requesting military aid.

medals.name: King's Cross
medals.description: The highest military honor, awarded by the sovereign personally for extraordinary heroism beyond the call of duty.
mechanicalEffects: All citizens of the awarding nation start with an Indifferent or better attitude.
Free lodging and meals in any military outpost.
You can request an audience with the monarch.

medals.name: Defender's Shield
medals.description: Awarded for successful defense of a city, fort, or strategic position against overwhelming odds.
mechanicalEffects: Advantage on Charisma checks when dealing with the populace of the defended location.
You are recognized and honored by the local population.
You may call upon the local garrison for limited aid.

medals.name: Star of Service
medals.description: Awarded for long and distinguished military service, typically 10 or more years.
mechanicalEffects: Military pension of 2 gp per month.
Right to use military training grounds and armories.
Advantage on Intelligence (History) checks related to military campaigns and tactics.

medals.name: Dragon's Bane Commendation
medals.description: Awarded for slaying a dragon or similar legendary threat that endangered a community.
mechanicalEffects: Your reputation precedes you; common folk treat you as Friendly.
Advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks against creatures of the same type as the one slain.
Bards may compose songs about your deed, granting you fame across the region.
